derivation: a primitive root; to be spare or skeleton-like; used only as a denominative from H1634 (גֶּרֶם);
outline:
1. to cut off, reserve, lay aside, leave, save
    1. (Qal) to reserve
  2. (Piel) to break bones, gnaw bones, break
strongs_def: (causative) to bone, i.e. denude (by extensive, craunch) the bones
